name: Format Code
description:
Format Code makes it easy to format code snippets and add a theme for syntax highlight


More features coming soon, including support for more languages and improvements in usability.


Design & Developed by Cândido Sales.


Languages supported


  • CSS;
  • HTML;
  • Javascript;
  • JSON;
  • Less;
  • Markdown;
  • SCSS;
  • Typescript;
  • YAML;


Themes supported


  • A 11 Y Dark;
  • A 11 Y Light;
  • Atom One Dark;
  • Atom One Light;
  • Default;
  • Dracula;
  • Ocean;
  • Paraiso Dark;
  • Paraiso Light;
  • Solarized Dark;
  • Solarized Light;
  • Vs;
  • Vs 2015;
  • Xcode;
